Home-Description: Here you can find the list of all games I played, as well as my favorite games, friend codes, and more!
Register-Success: Registration successful! You can now log in.
Register-Error: Error during registration. Please try again.
Register-PasswordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, and a special character.
Auth-SessionExpired: Your session has expired, please log in again.
Auth-Deconnected: You have been successfully logged out.
Auth-DeconnectionAlert: Do you want to log out?
Login-Error: Login error, please check your credentials.
Login-PseudoMinLength: Username must be at least 5 characters
Login-PasswordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
Footer-Description: This site is a personal project to share my favorite games and friend codes. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or suggestions!
Footer-Disclaimer: (All games, titles, images, and associated trademarks are the property of their respective owners. This site is not affiliated with the publishers or manufacturers of the games presented. Game rights belong to their respective producers, publishers, and creators.)
Codes-Disclaimer: Genshin Impact and Zenless Zone Zero codes are linked to the European server.
Collection-EmptyUser: You haven't added any games to your collection yet.
Collection-EmptyAdmin: hasn't added any games to their collection yet.
Collection-Removed: has been removed from your collection.
Collection-DeleteError: Error while deleting the game. Please try again.
Collection-RetrieveError: Error while retrieving the collection. Please try again.
